sql.name: networkqualityhoncho
sql.item: select distinct(g.C630000018) as 派发部门, count(distinct( t.C1)) as 投诉总量, sum(case when t.c802000005 is not null then 1 else 0 end) as 参加活动员工数, sum(case when t.c802000009=0 then 1 else 0 end) as 当天问题解决数量, sum(case when t.c802000009=1 then 1 else 0 end) as 当天限期解决问题数量, sum(case when t.c802000009=2 then 1 else 0 end) as 三天内问题解决数量, sum(case when t.c802000009=3 then 1 else 0 end) as 三天为限期解决数量, sum(case when t.c802000009=4 then 1 else 0 end) as 暂未计划解决数量 from {100} t,{200} u,{300} g,{400} gu where t.c700000005=u.C630000001 and u.C1=gu.C620000028 and gu.C620000027=g.C1 {2} {5} --and g.c630000037 like '%000000000600389%' group by g.C630000018
